```{r}

library(Seurat)
library(reticulate)
library(arrow)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(SeuratDisk)
obj.mouse.glutamatergic <- LoadH5Seurat("E:/Mouse_M1/seurat/mouse_m1_glutamatergic.h5Seurat")

```


```{r}

obj.mouse.glutamatergic <- FindVariableFeatures(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, selection.method = "vst", nfeatures = 3000)
all.genes <- rownames(obj.mouse.glutamatergic)
obj.mouse.glutamatergic <- ScaleData(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, features = all.genes)
obj.mouse.glutamatergic <- RunPCA(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, features = VariableFeatures(object = obj.mouse.glutamatergic))
ElbowPlot(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, ndims = 50)

```


```{r}

obj.mouse.glutamatergic <- FindNeighbors(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, dims = 1:30)
obj.mouse.glutamatergic <- FindClusters(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, resolution = 1, algorithm = 4, method = "igraph")
obj.mouse.glutamatergic <- RunUMAP(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, dims = 1:30, method="umap-learn")

```


```{r}

Idents(obj.mouse.glutamatergic) <- "subclass"
obj.mouse.glutamatergic <- subset(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, subset = subclass_label != "L6 IT Car3")

```

```{r}

Idents(obj.mouse.glutamatergic) <- "RNA_snn_res.1.5"
cells.pv <- WhichCells(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, ident = c("2", "3", "4", "5", "8", "20", "21", "24"))
obj.mouse.glutamatergic$subclass <- ifelse(colnames(obj.mouse.glutamatergic) %in% cells.pv, "Pvalb", "ambiguous")

cells.sst <- WhichCells(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, ident = c("6", "9", "12", "15", "16", "17"))
obj.mouse.glutamatergic$subclass[cells.sst] <- "Sst"

cells.chodl <- WhichCells(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, ident = c("23"))
obj.mouse.glutamatergic$subclass[cells.chodl] <- "Sst Chodl"

cells.vip <- WhichCells(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, ident = c("7", "10", "14", "19", "22"))
obj.mouse.glutamatergic$subclass[cells.vip] <- "Vip"

cells.lamp5 <- WhichCells(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, ident = c("1", "11", "18", "25"))
obj.mouse.glutamatergic$subclass[cells.lamp5] <- "Lamp5"

cells.lamp5 <- WhichCells(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, ident = c("13"))
obj.mouse.glutamatergic$subclass[cells.lamp5] <- "Sncg"

cells.lamp5 <- WhichCells(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, ident = c("26"))
obj.mouse.glutamatergic$subclass[cells.lamp5] <- "Meis2"

```


```{r}

Idents(obj.mouse.glutamatergic) <- "subclass_label"
glutamatergic.total <- ncol(subset(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, idents = c("Pvalb", "Sst", "Sst Chodl", "Vip", "Lamp5", "Sncg", "Meis2")))
pv.total <- ncol(subset(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, idents = c("Pvalb")))
sst.total <- ncol(subset(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, idents = c("Sst", "Sst Chodl")))
vip.total <- ncol(subset(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, idents = c("Vip")))
lamp5.total <- ncol(subset(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, idents = c("Lamp5")))
sncg.total <- ncol(subset(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, idents = c("Sncg")))
meis2.total <- ncol(subset(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, idents = c("Meis2")))

data <- data.frame(
  group = c("PV", "SST", "VIP", "LAMP5", "SNCG", "Meis2"),
  value = c(pv.total, sst.total, vip.total, lamp5.total, sncg.total, meis2.total)
)

# Compute the position of labels
data <- data %>% 
  arrange(desc(group)) %>%
  mutate(prop = value / sum(data$value) *100) %>%
  mutate(ypos = cumsum(prop)- 0.5*prop )

# Basic piechart
ggplot(data, aes(x="", y=prop, fill=group)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", width=1) +
  coord_polar("y", start=0) +
  theme_void() + 
  geom_text(aes(y = ypos, label = sprintf("%.1f%%", prop)), color = "white", size=5) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette="Set1")
 
```

DoHeatmap(object = obj.mouse.glutamatergic, cholinergic.markers, slot = "data") + scale_fill_gradientn(colors = c("white", "red")) + theme(text = element_text(size = 10))
expr <- AverageExpression(obj.mouse.glutamatergic, assays = "RNA", return.seurat = TRUE, features = cholinergic.markers)
DoHeatmap(expr, features = cholinergic.markers, slot = "data", draw.lines = FALSE, size = 3) + scale_fill_gradientn(colors = magma(100), limits = c(0, 3)) + theme(text = element_text(size = 10))
